subject: the tiny echo box
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_64af_7f9a_6b4d
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I might be able to start using this tonight. If it works it's going in #12. 
It never ceases to amaze me that I have everyting I need for this stuff, 
like a speaker just the right size for this box, and I don't remember where 
I got it.
BTW, one of the voice I e-mailed said aboutr time, now going throught the 
tape forwards, I think it says "he's trying to fix it" then there's some 
males voices down in the dirt "look at those radio parts".

Frank-S
